mapper.select: SELECT ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM ums_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN ums_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_resource ur ON ur.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id

SELECT r.id id, r.create_time createTime, r.`name` `name`, r.url url, r.description description, r.category_id categoryId FROM ums_role_resource_relation rrr LEFT JOIN ums_resource r ON rrr.resource_id = r.id WHERE rrr.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.id
